main_address_raw_text: badri sarraf vishwanath jewellers, kalyanpur ring road, lucknow jewellery/watches in lucknow, uttar pradesh near hans bhakti dham,kamla nehru nagar, opposite kalyanpur taxi stand
short_description: badri sarraf is a watches & jewelry store based in lucknow, india.
long_description: rings, occasion pieces, pandora & more. we focus on providing our admirers with a different aesthetic in every design in 22k gold and 18k / 14k diamond jewellery collections for weddings, lightweight casual requirements, and formal wear. every piece in our collection is carefully handpicked and sourced from national as well as internationally acclaimed jewellery manufacturers, and international jewellery exhibitions. our product range also includes kundan, and antique styles of jewelery, silver jewellery and silverware, and natural birthstones. our jewelry designs are not only elegant and aesthetic, but are also unique in themselves, just as they are made for women. we have jewelry for every occasion that will set you apart and make the world wow. by mixing the heritage and ethics of a diamond and jewelery family business with business education and modern technology, papillier is an effort by the two brothers to look at the way diamond jewelery is sold in india.
